frontMatter.title: Bedrock CMMC Public Beta Coming January 2026

blogPosts.content:
Mark your calendars - Bedrock CMMC is entering public beta in January 2026.

<!-- truncate -->

## Join the Beta Program

We're inviting organizations to participate in our public beta program. As a beta participant, you'll get:

- **Early access** to Bedrock CMMC before general availability
- **Direct influence** on product development through feedback
- **Priority support** from our team
- **Special pricing** for early adopters

## Who Should Join

The beta is ideal for:

- Defense Industrial Base (DIB) contractors preparing for CMMC certification
- Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) supporting DIB clients
- Organizations currently working toward NIST SP 800-171 compliance
- C3PAOs interested in streamlined assessment workflows

## What to Expect

During the beta period, we'll be:

- Gathering feedback on core features
- Testing at scale with real compliance workflows
- Refining the user experience
- Hardening security and performance

## Get Notified

Want to be first in line when the beta opens? Visit [foxxcyber.com](https://foxxcyber.com) to join the waitlist.

---

Questions about the beta program? Reach out at [beta@foxxcyber.com](mailto:beta@foxxcyber.com).

prevItem.title: Bedrock CMMC Public Beta Coming January 2026

blogPosts.content:
We're excited to announce the initial release of Bedrock CMMC, our comprehensive compliance management platform designed to help organizations achieve and maintain CMMC certification.

<!-- truncate -->

## What's Included

This foundational release includes:

### ATO Package Management
- Create and manage Authorization to Operate packages
- Track package status and completeness
- Organize compliance documentation

### Control Assessment
- Full NIST SP 800-171 Rev 3 control library (110 requirements)
- Assess implementation status for each control
- Track compliance progress by control family

### Evidence Management
- Upload and organize compliance evidence
- Link evidence to specific controls
- Maintain audit-ready documentation

### POA&M Tracking
- Create and manage Plans of Action & Milestones
- Set remediation timelines and milestones
- Track progress on identified gaps

### SSP Generation
- Generate System Security Plans
- Track SSP readiness
- Export documentation for assessors

### Asset Inventory
- Catalog system components
- Track assets within scope
- Maintain hardware and software inventory

### C3PAO Marketplace
- Browse certified assessor organizations
- Request assessments
- Manage assessor engagements

## What's Next

We're actively developing new features and improvements. Stay tuned for updates as we prepare for our public beta launch in January 2026.

---

Questions or feedback? Contact us at [support@foxxcyber.com](mailto:support@foxxcyber.com).
